name: Undercurrent (itch)
description:
Undercurrent A small explorative horror. Part of the Haunted PS1's Summer Of Shivers Jam.

Available currently on Mac and Windows.

Playtime: 10 minutes.

Movement: WASD + Mouse
Interact: E

Created by Dave_ja, a single person Jam team. This is my first full game so don't be shocked if there are a few bugs! Just pretend it's part of the horror! BOO!
